title.text: Unemployment Rates and Wchool Enrollment Worldwide
subtitle: Unemployment % (x), School Enrollment, tertiary % (y). 2020 data
Size of points based on popluation. Source: The World Bank

transform.expr: isValid(datum["Unemployment (%)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Unemployment (%)"]) && isValid(datum["School Enrollment, tertiary (%)"]) && isFinite(+datum["School Enrollment, tertiary (%)"]) && isValid(datum["Population"]) && isFinite(+datum["Population"])

tooltip.signal: {"Country": isValid(datum["Country Name"]) ? datum["Country Name"] : ""+datum["Country Name"], "Unemployment(%)": format(datum["Unemployment (%)"], ".0f"), "Enrollment (%)": format(datum["School Enrollment, tertiary (%)"], ".2f"), "Population": format(datum["Population"], ",")}

description.signal: "Unemployment (%): " + (format(datum["Unemployment (%)"], "")) + "; School Enrollment, tertiary (%): " + (format(datum["School Enrollment, tertiary (%)"], "")) + "; Population: " + (format(datum["Population"], "")) + "; Country: " + (isValid(datum["Country Name"]) ? datum["Country Name"] : ""+datum["Country Name"]) + "; Unemployment(%): " + (format(datum["Unemployment (%)"], ".0f")) + "; Enrollment (%): " + (format(datum["School Enrollment, tertiary (%)"], ".2f"))
